**Instructional Materials**

Instructional materials were created in collaboration with Samantha Olivares-Mejia for the Southwest Network Collaboratione [![Hyperlink](Link.png)](https://www.nps.gov/im/chdn/swnc.htm). They are intended for users with little to no R coding experience. 

*GitHub Tutorial* <br>
A beginners tutorial on how to use GitHub.
[![Hyperlink](Link.png)](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/sam-olivares-mejia/SWNC_2_Learning_Github/blob/main/Github_Basics.html)

*R Coding Basics* <br>
Basics lesson for R coding.
[![Hyperlink](Link.png)](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/LauraFalk/R_Teaching/blob/main/Week_1_Basics.html)

*R Code Data Wrangling Techniques* <br>
This Repository contains a fill-in the blank instructional materials, with the suffix "Learner.RMD". Files with the suffix "Main.RMD" and "Main.html" contain answers to the learner files.
